item.title: AI Benchmarks for 2025
item.author: nuno@n9o.xyz (Blowfish)
item.description:
AI Benchmarks for 2025

A term “AI benchmark” is thrown around a lot and can be confusing because itâ€™s used in slightly different ways depending on the context. In this artcile we will try to understand what are the different meaning of this term and what are the latest AI benchmarks.
